properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nene unnavaada nanina advitheeya Prabhu aaraadintu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}నేనే ఉన్నవాడననిన అద్వితీయ ప్రభు ఆరాధింతు{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}तू ने कहा, अद्धैत ईश्वर, "मैं जो हूँ", स्तुति मैं करूँ तेरी{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Alphayu omega vartha maana bhootha Bhavishyathulo nunna vaadaa naa sarvamu Nirvahinchu vaadaa sarvaadhikaari ninne Stutinchi arpinthu neeke naa aaraadhana{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Edu suvarna depa stambhamula madya Sancharinchu chunna vaadaa shuddeekarinchitivi Nannu melimiga maarchi sanghamuna cherchitivi Nenne aaraadhintu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thellani unnini poliyunna ventrukalu kaligi Yunna vaadaa aalochana kartha neeve naaku Jnaana maitvi asamaanunda arpintu Neeke naa aaraadhana{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sooryuni vanti mukhamu kaligi agnijwaalala Netramul kaligi drustinchitivi naa hrudayamun Dahinchitivi dustathwamu premagala Prabhoo ninnaaraadintu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aparanjini polina paadamulu kalavaadaa theerpu Theerchitivi paapamu lokamula nila dusta Saataanun siluvalo gelichi vijaya mitchi Nandula kaaraadintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee noti nundi bayaluvedale rendanchulu Gala vaadi khadgamu adiye paatha aadaamunu Champe nashimpa jese naa shatru balamun Arpintu neeke naa aaraadhana{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Edu nakshtramulu pattu konina modati Vaadaa kadapati vaadaa sarva sampoornatha Naa kitchitivi apaayamulalo aadukonu chunna Aamen anuvaadaa Halleluya{/lang-eng}

verse.name: o1
